name: compact
trans: smaller than other things of the same kind

name: exterior
trans: the outside of something

name: interior
trans: the inside part of something

name: disability
trans: a physical or mental condition that makes someone unable to act in a way that is considered usual for most people

name: incapacitated
trans: lacking in or deprived of strength or power

name: poverty
trans: the condition of being poor

name: Account for
trans: to make up or form a part of something

name: unwieldy
trans: (of an object) difficult to move or handle because it is heavy, large, or a strange shape

name: slippery
trans: sliding easily or causing something to slide because of being wet, smooth, or oily

name: slope
trans: a surface that rises at an angle, esp. a hill or mountain, or the angle at which something rises

name: abound
trans: to exist in large numbers

name: recreation
trans: something done for pleasure or to relax, or such activities generally

name: switch
trans: a device that controls an electric current and turns it on or off

name: ramp
trans: a surface connecting a higher and a lower level; a slope

name: curb
trans: a raised edge along the side of a street, often forming part of a path for people to walk on

name: corridor
trans: a long passage in a building, ship, or train, esp. with rooms on one or both side

name: necessitate
trans: to make something necessary

name: update
trans: to make something more accurate and suitable for use now by showing new facts or conditions

name: capable
trans: having the skill or ability or strength to do something

name: terrain
trans: an area of land, esp. when considering its natural features
